content:
Cashback credit cards with no annual fee can be a great way to earn rewards without incurring additional costs. Here are some popular options:

**1. Citi Double Cash Card**

* Earn 2% cashback on all purchases: 1% when you buy, 1% when you pay your bill
* No rotating categories or spending limits
* No annual fee
* 0% intro APR for 18 months on balance transfers (then 15.74% - 25.74% (Variable) APR)

**2. Chase Freedom Unlimited**

* Earn 3% cashback on all purchases in your first year up to $20,000 spent, and 1.5% cashback on all other purchases
* No rotating categories or spending limits
* No annual fee
* 0% intro APR for 15 months on purchases and balance transfers (then 16.49% - 25.24% Variable APR)

**3. Discover it Cash Back**

* Earn 5% cashback on various categories throughout the year, such as gas stations, grocery stores, or restaurants, and 1% cashback on all other purchases
* No annual fee
* 0% intro APR for 14 months on purchases and balance transfers (then 13.49% - 24.49% Variable APR)
* Cashback Match: Discover will match all the cashback you've earned at the end of your first year

**4. Capital One Quicksilver Cash Rewards Credit Card**

* Earn unlimited 1.5% cashback on all purchases
* No rotating categories or spending limits
* No annual fee
* 0% intro APR for 15 months on purchases and balance transfers (then 15.49% - 25.49% Variable APR)

**5. Bank of America Cash Rewards credit card**

* Earn 3% cashback on gas, 2% cashback on groceries, and 1% cashback on everything else
* No annual fee
* 0% intro APR for 12 months on purchases and balance transfers (then 13.99% - 23.99% Variable APR)

**6. Wells Fargo Propel American Express card**

* Earn 3X points on dining, 2X points on gas, and 1X point on everything else
* No annual fee
* 0% intro APR for 12 months on purchases and balance transfers (then 14.49% - 24.49% Variable APR)

Remember to always read the terms and conditions, and consider your individual financial situation and spending habits before applying for a credit card.
